translation.en: -[footsteps thudding] -[loud roaring]
Trust me, I'm your friend.
[Chatter] Bawk! Run for your lives!
Finger five on it!
[Wheeler] Get ready, Brag.
Only about 15 minutes to San Francisco.
[chuckles] And our ten million.
Thanks to that little black market baby. [laughing]
I still can't believe we found a collector
willing to pay that much for a stinkin' ape.
Come on, Wheeler, we might have bagged the last wild ape on Earth!
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 지구 상에 남은 마지막 유인원일지도 모르는데

translation.en: Hey! How the heck did he get out?
[Wheeler] Who cares? Just get him back in the cage!
Stand still, you miserable little...
Gotcha!
Get off me, Brag, or we'll crash!
-[alarm buzzing] -[grunts]
Hold on!
[gasps] Don't move, Wheeler.
Don't even breathe.
-Oh, no! -We gotta get outta here!
-[chitters happily] -Yeah, 'cause our ten mil is getting away!
No way we're letting all that money escape!
[Richard] Dad, did you hear that crash?
Must have been the chopper that just flew over.
[Leo] I just spoke to 911.
They're dispatching rescue workers, but it will take time to get up here.
We need to try and locate that crash and see if there are any survivors.
translation.ko: 추락 지점을 찾아서 생존자가 있는지 보자

translation.en: I'm sure the sound came from this direction.
You know these woods better than anyone, so, lead the way, Lukas.
translation.ko: 이 숲은 네가 잘 아니 앞장서라, 루커스

translation.en: -[gun firing] -[Brag] Gah! Missed! I'll nail the little...
[Lukas] That sounded like a gunshot.
I bet the pilot fired a rescue flare.
Or maybe poachers are hunting the Redwoods again!
Either way, let's keep a sharp eye and stick close.
translation.ko: 어쨌거나 잘 살피고 흩어지면 안 돼

translation.en: Don't worry, Dad, I know what I'm doing.
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요, 아빠 저도 잘 알아요

translation.en: Ugh! Oh, gross!
-I just stepped in... -[sniffing] Deer dung!
translation.ko: 뭘 밟은 거지? 사슴 똥이야! 정말 잘됐어

translation.en: [laughing] Oh, this is great!
Thanks a lot, Lukas.
No, I meant, I haven't seen any for so long,
I was afraid there might not be any deer left!
Between habitat destruction and poachers,
in another ten or so years, I fear there won't be any wild animals left.
Too bad bugs aren't extinct.
I hate them so much,
I'm going to invent a gigantic bionic insect-eating spider.
translation.ko: 벌레 정말 싫어 벌레 먹는 거대한 생체공학 거미를 만들 거야

translation.en: Hello! Spiders already eat insects, Richard.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리 원래 거미가 벌레를 잡아먹거든

translation.en: Nature takes care of itself.
We don't need Richard's useless bionics.
[gasps] I can't believe you just dissed our dad!
translation.ko: 너 방금 아빠 무시한 거 알지?

translation.en: -I didn't. -Yeah, he did!
Dad's the most important bionics scientist in the whole world.
translation.ko: 아빠는 세계에서 가장 권위 있는 생체공학자잖아

translation.en: You know I didn't mean it like that!
I understand how you feel, Lukas.
I love nature, too.
translation.ko: 나도 자연을 사랑해서 생체공학을 하게 됐어

translation.en: That's why I got into bionics, to help people and injured animals.
translation.ko: 나도 자연을 사랑해서 생체공학을 하게 됐어 인간과 다친 동물을 도우려고

translation.en: Lukas!
[Wheeler] We got him now!
[Brag chuckles] No way out.
translation.ko: 이제 잡았다 이제 도망 못 가

translation.en: [Brag groans] Out of tranq darts!
[Lukas] Come with me.
[whispers] Hurry, this way. I want to help you.
Trust me.
I'm your friend.
[Brag] Hey! What the... [Wheeler] Where'd that rotten ape go now?
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거지? 그 망할 원숭이 어디 갔어?

translation.en: -Come on! -There!
-Cops! -[helicopter whirring]
[Brag] We gotta get outta here!
Okay, but I swear, one day, I'll find that filthy brat
translation.ko: 좋아 맹세하는데 천만 달러를 놓치게 한 저 꼬맹이를 찾고 말 테다

translation.en: that just cost us $10 million!
translation.ko: 천만 달러를 놓치게 한 저 꼬맹이를 찾고 말 테다

translation.en: [Leo] Your brother was right.
The police said the helicopter they found was definitely used by poachers.
translation.ko: 경찰이 찾은 헬기는 밀렵꾼들 게 맞대

translation.en: You think they got Lukas?
-Maybe they'll hold him for-- -He's fine.
translation.ko: 루커스가 잡혔어요? 루커스를 포로로 잡고... 아니야

translation.en: Lukas sent a holo-text saying he has a surprise for us.
translation.ko: 루커스가 놀라게 해 줄 일이 있다고 문자를 보냈어

translation.en: [Lukas whispers] I just had to wait for the police to leave.
Why? What are you hiding?
Shh! Be quiet, you'll scare the baby.
[both] Baby?
The poachers were shooting at him, so I had to help.
This is my dad, Dr. Leo Remy.
And my brother, Richard.
-[whimpers] -It's okay.
I swear, I'm never gonna let anyone hurt you again.
translation.ko: 절대 아무도 널 해치지 못하게 할게

translation.en: -[squeals] -Lukas, you shouldn't lie!
Even to a dumb monkey.
Not a monkey, Richard.
I'm certain that this is a baby gorilla,
which were believed to be extinct in the wild!
Okay, fine. A dumb ape.
But Lukas still lied.
You can't protect it.
We have to turn it over to the police or a zoo or someplace...
No! Dad, we have to keep him!
If we don't, he could end up spending his entire life locked in a cage!
translation.ko: 안 그러면 평생 우리에 갇혀 지내게 될 거예요

translation.en: Or worse, in some lab!
Now, I appreciate what you're saying, son, but while he's cute and little now,
translation.ko: 네 마음은 이해한다만 지금은 작고 귀엽지만 다 자란 고릴라는...

translation.en: once he becomes a full-grown gorilla...
translation.ko: 지금은 작고 귀엽지만 다 자란 고릴라는...

translation.en: [Richard] Apes in the wild could grow up to 5'11" and weigh over 500 pounds?
translation.ko: 야생 유인원은 키 180cm에 몸무게는 230kg까지 자랄 수 있어

translation.en: [scoffs] Forget that!
translation.ko: 몸무게는 230kg까지 자랄 수 있어 절대 안 돼

translation.en: Anyway, if Mom were here, she'd never let you keep it.
translation.ko: 엄마가 계셨다면 절대 못 키우게 했을걸

translation.en: Yeah, well, Mom moved back east with her new husband, so why don't you just--
translation.ko: 그렇지만 엄마는 새 남편과 동부로 이사하셨고...

translation.en: -Now, that's not the point. -Right! Dad...
You've always told us that it's every human's responsibility
to do everything they can to protect wildlife.
So, this is our chance to do the right thing!
Please, Dad...
[sighs] Very well.
We can see how he does back home in the city.
But, it's just a test. No promises.
translation.ko: 이건 테스트야 아직 약속은 못 해

translation.en: And you boys will be responsible for taking care of your...
your pet.
Nuh-uh! Not me. I didn't ask to live with a smelly ape.
translation.ko: 난 이 냄새 나는 원숭이랑 살기 싫어요

translation.en: I'll do it! I'll take care of everything he needs.
I swear, Dad!
[chuckling] All right, we'll give it a try.
Now let's start packing up.
Hey, hey, you need a name.
[chittering] Kong! Kong! Kong!
translation.ko: 참, 너도 이름이 있어야지 콩, 콩, 콩

translation.en: [laughs] That's it, then.
You are Kong!
[Lukas] Hey, Dad, are you going to the lab today?
I wanna show Kong your island.
[Leo] Now, let's just see how baby Kong adapts first.
Oh, he'll be great! No prob. [softly] Oh, come on.
Fit right in.
Until Anita sees his ugly face and freaks out.
translation.ko: 애니타가 쟤를 보고 기겁하면 얘기가 다르지

translation.en: You are late, Dr. Remy!
But I made your favorite cookies, anyway.
[Chatter] Bawk! Favorite cookies!
translation.ko: 그래도 좋아하시는 쿠키 만들어 뒀어요 좋아하시는 쿠키

translation.en: Thank you, Anita, but I need to warn you that...
translation.ko: 고마워요, 애니타 미리 말해 둘 게 있는데

translation.en: we have a little surprise.
Let's get 'em, Kong! [laughing]
It's all right, Anita, it's not a monster.
It's, uh, just a baby gorilla.
Oh, yeah, Anita's gonna quit for sure if the ape isn't history.
translation.ko: 저 원숭이 안 없애면 애니타가 그만둘걸

translation.en: [Lukas] Wow, Anita! Baby Kong totally loves your cookies.
At least el pequeño has good taste.
Oh, what a good niño!
You can have the last cookie!
[Chatter] Bawk! No fair! Bawk! No fair!
Aw, man, I can't believe this.
[chuckling] Well, I'm very happy to see
Chatter's new bionic wing is working so well.
First bionic bird! Bawk!
First bionic bird! Bawk!
I am very glad you were able to save his life,
translation.ko: 요 녀석 목숨을 구해줘서 정말 기쁘긴 한데

translation.en: but did you have to save his voice as well, Dr. Remy?
-He's such an annoying chatter box! -[Chatter] Bawk!
One hurdle down.
Kong seems to have won Anita over.
Now let's see how the little fellow does inside our houseboat.
[Lukas] Hey, Kong, want to come toss the ball with us?
-[Kong chitters] -Do you know how to throw a ball?
translation.ko: 콩 공 던지기 놀이 할래? 공 던질 줄 알아? 이렇게 해 봐

translation.en: Like this.
translation.ko: 공 던질 줄 알아? 이렇게 해 봐

translation.en: -[grunts] -Throw it back!
No! That's my ball!
Throw it! Don't eat it!
[laughs] Like this.
Like this.
Whoa! That's some arm!
Happy you're on my team.
Catch me if you can!
Hey! I'm trying to study here!
[Lukas laughing] Come on, Kong! Over here!
[Leo] What happened? I--
Kong grew... again!
Stop that! Awk! Big ape! Bawk!
[Leo] Kong is already as large and heavy as any gorilla in recorded history.
translation.ko: 콩은 역사상 존재한 고릴라 중 제일 크고 무거워 그런데 아직도 아기야

translation.en: And he's still technically just a baby.
And way stronger, too.
Dad, you should see his fastball.
Kong could pitch the World Series!
Check out what he did to my mitt!
Everyone, outside! Now!
-We need to get onto the dock! -[Lukas] Is it an earthquake?
No, it's your overgrown ape!
[Chatter] Bawk! Run for your lives!
-[crowd murmuring] -[man] What is that thing? It's huge!
I can't believe Kong wrecked our house.
He grew right through it!
Everything's gone!
[sighs] I'm just grateful no one was hurt.
Don't worry, everything will be okay.
Wanna bet?
Uh-oh! Big ape! Bawk! Big trouble!
Don't shoot! I'm Dr. Leo Remy.
translation.ko: 쏘지 마세요 난 리오 레미 박사요

translation.en: I assure you, this animal is harmless.
translation.ko: 이 녀석은 절대 사람을 안 해쳐요

translation.en: Hold your fire, but keep your weapons trained on that...
translation.ko: 사격 중지! 하지만 총구는 계속 겨눠

translation.en: giant gorilla?
Kong really blew it this time!
The police are gonna put him away, or maybe even destroy him for this!
Nobody's gonna hurt my bro.
translation.ko: 아무도 내 동생을 해칠 순 없어

translation.en: Kong! Kong, listen to me!
Hold your fire!
It's okay, Kong, you know you can trust me.
[laughs] Nice move, Kong.
You see, Captain, he's completely tame and quite gentle.
[stammers] Kong really is a good boy.
Well, maybe...
but I still can't let this giant home-wrecker run around free.
translation.ko: 집을 부순 저 거대한 놈을 그냥 둘 순 없어요

translation.en: He must be contained and controlled
until a judge can decide what should be done with him.
Done with him?
We gotta get outta here.
I'm telling Dad, I'm taking you home.
[whispers] Get ready, Kong. Now, go!
Why don't they start shooting?
They can't risk hitting your brother.
Dr. Remy?
You are Dr. Leo Remy, the famous scientist?
translation.ko: 그 유명한 과학자 리오 레미 박사님이시죠?

translation.en: He's my dad.
Tell me, Doctor, is that creature
some super-sized bionic experiment of yours?
translation.ko: 저 생명체는 박사님이 만든 생체공학 괴물인가요?

translation.en: I can assure you that Kong is flesh and blood
and poses no threat to anyone.
I will stake my reputation on it and I take full responsibility for him.
translation.ko: 제 명성을 걸고 보장해요 제가 다 책임을 진다고요

translation.en: And where are the boy and the monster-ape going?
translation.ko: 아드님과 그 괴물 원숭이는 어디로 갔나요?

translation.en: Somewhere that Kong will be no danger to society.
translation.ko: 콩이 사회에 해를 안 주고 무사할 수 있는

translation.en: Or it to him.
Dr. Remy, what will we do now? Where will we all live?
translation.ko: 레미 박사님 이제 어쩌죠? 어디서 살아요?

translation.en: Yeah, now that Kong totally trashed our houseboat.
[Chatter] Bawk! We're sunk!
Before this happened,
I'd already been thinking about how we'd be able to keep Kong.
translation.ko: 콩을 어디서 키울지 이미 생각해 뒀어요

translation.en: So, I bought a place for us in the Redwoods.
translation.ko: 그래서 레드우즈에 땅을 좀 사 뒀어

translation.en: What? But that's not fair! I don't wanna leave the city!
translation.ko: 네? 그건 너무해요 전 도시를 떠나기 싫어요

translation.en: I hate the forest. And what about school?
Ugh, you're home-schooled, Richard, nothing changes there.
translation.ko: 어차피 홈스쿨 하잖아 변하는 건 없어

translation.en: Look, son, I'm sure you'll feel differently when you see it.
translation.ko: 리처드, 너도 가 보면 분명 마음에 들 거다

translation.en: [Lukas] Hey, watch it! [Richard] What's the big idea?
[Lukas laughs] The paint's supposed to go on the house, not on us!
I made lemonade for my hard-working muchachos!
translation.ko: 열심히 일하는데 레모네이드 좀 마시고 하렴

translation.en: [Leo] For you, too, Kong.
[Chatter] Bawk! Excuse you!
Well, at least now we don't have to worry about his belching
translation.ko: 그래도 콩 트림 때문에 이웃이 깰까 봐

translation.en: waking the neighbors anymore.
I still don't think it's fair that Kong destroys our home,
translation.ko: 그래도 콩이 집을 부순 건 너무 심했어요

translation.en: I lose all my stuff,
and you move me to this bug-filled forest
translation.ko: 이 벌레 가득한 숲으로 이사 오다니

translation.en: just so we can keep him!
But, Richard, it wasn't just for Kong.
I've always wanted room for a state-of-the-art lab at home...
translation.ko: 집에 최첨단 실험실을 지을 공간이 있었으면 했거든

translation.en: where you will be able to begin that robotic dinosaur you've always dreamed of.
translation.ko: 네가 그토록 원하는 로봇 공룡도 만들 수 있고

translation.en: Seriously?
Let's check it out!
It's amazing!
[Lukas] I can't wait to see your first robotic dinosaur.
translation.ko: 네가 만든 로봇 공룡을 얼른 보고 싶구나

translation.en: [Leo] But, Richard, you can only work on your project when I am present,
translation.ko: 하지만 리처드, 내가 있을 때만 작업해야 해

translation.en: and even then, you must never touch any of the lasers.
translation.ko: 그리고 레이저는 절대 건드리면 안 돼

translation.en: Now, I need your word of honor that you will never go into the lab alone.
translation.ko: 혼자선 절대 실험실에 안 들어온다고 맹세해

translation.en: I swear!
No, Kong! You are not allowed in here!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 콩 넌 여기 못 들어와

translation.en: There's just too many delicate instruments, and extremely dangerous lasers.
translation.ko: 정교한 기계도 많고 레이저는 너무 위험해

translation.en: Now, Lukas, I want your word, too,
that you will make certain Kong never goes into the lab, no matter what.
translation.ko: 절대 콩이 실험실에 못 들어오게 한다고

translation.en: You don't have to worry, Dad.
The last thing Kong and I want is to be indoors
when there's so much exploring to do outside!
[Lukas] We'll see you later!
[whispers] Come on, bro.
Time to start building our top-secret fort.
No one, not even Dad, can know about it.
It's gonna be our own special hideout!
Finger five on it, bro!
You know, Kong,
the California redwoods are the tallest trees on Earth.
translation.ko: 캘리포니아 미국삼나무는 지구에서 가장 키가 커

translation.en: [chuckling] Luckily, they're even taller than you.
That's what I call a real "king-size" bed.
And now I don't need to always take the Kong-vator to get up here.
translation.ko: 이제 네가 매번 날 안 올려줘도 돼

translation.en: [sighs] Wow! It's so cool being up so high!
translation.ko: 우와! 높은 데 올라오니 진짜 좋다

translation.en: What a view!
Our secret hideout is awesome!
But I promise, one day, when I'm old enough to afford it,
we are gonna turn this place into a real fortress!
With high-tech camouflage,
and I'll lay in enough banana chips
translation.ko: 바나나 칩과 다른 음식을 충분히 저장해

translation.en: and other survival food to last a lifetime!
translation.ko: 바나나 칩과 다른 음식을 충분히 저장해 평생 먹을 수 있게 할 거야

translation.en: So no matter what happens, no one from down there, or anywhere,
translation.ko: 그럼 무슨 일이 생겨도 어느 누구도 너를 해칠 수는 없어

translation.en: will ever be able to hurt you.
translation.ko: 어느 누구도 너를 해칠 수는 없어

translation.en: -[crackling] -Check it out, Dad!
I made it so it can crush anything that gets in our way!
Very impressive.
[chuckling] Well, I'm proud of you, son.
Thanks, Dad, but it's still not right.
If I could just use your laser,
I know I could get it as smooth and shiny as my design.
translation.ko: 제 디자인만큼 매끈하고 번쩍이게 할 수 있어요

translation.en: Out of the question, Richard.
You know my lasers are off-limits.
I don't see what's the big deal!
I've watched you use them.
No, they're too dangerous.
But maybe when I have time, I can do it for you.
translation.ko: 내가 시간이 있을 때 대신 해줄 순 있어

translation.en: No! This is my invention!
I have to do it all myself.
Well, I think it looks amazing and you did a great job.
See you after work.
Dad, I can't find my computer tablet with my school assignments.
translation.ko: 아빠, 제가 숙제를 한 컴퓨터 태블릿이 안 보여요

translation.en: I'm sure I left it on my desk, but it's not there anymore.
translation.ko: 분명히 책상 위에 뒀는데 거기 없어요

translation.en: I've looked everywhere for it!
We have been searching, too. [Chatter] Bawk! No luck!
I thought I saw Lukas take it outside yesterday
translation.ko: 어제 루커스가 밖으로 가지고 나오는 거 봤어요

translation.en: when he went to play with Kong after class.
No, I'm sure I didn't.
But now I can't do my classes online and I have a big exam tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 중요한 시험인데 수업을 못 듣게 됐어요

translation.en: It's not like you to lose something so important.
translation.ko: 그렇게 중요한 걸 잃다니 너답지 않구나

translation.en: Well, you'll have to fly into the city with me today and buy a new tablet.
translation.ko: 지금 나하고 시내에 나가 새 태블릿을 사야겠다

translation.en: [Lukas] I'm really sorry, Dad.
I swear, I don't understand how it happened.
Richard, would you like to come with us?
Thanks, Dad, but I really shouldn't skip class today.
translation.ko: 전 됐어요 오늘 수업 꼭 들어야 해요

translation.en: Not with the big exam coming up.
[Anita and Chatter singing] ♪ Vamos, vamos, vacuum! ♪
Perfect. Anita will never hear a thing.
translation.ko: 좋아, 애니타는 아무것도 못 들을 거야

translation.en: Mind your own business, banana breath!
What are you gonna do?
You're not even as smart as a three-year-old.
Oh, look! There's Lukas!
So long, chump.
When this is done, Dad's gonna see how right I was.
translation.ko: 이걸 완성하면 아빠도 인정해 주실 거야

translation.en: Then he'll really be proud of me!
Stop bothering me, or when I'm done, I'll sic T-Rex on you.
translation.ko: 그만 귀찮게 해 이거 끝나면 티렉스한테 혼날 줄 알아

translation.en: No, Dr. Remy, I do not see Richard or Kong,
translation.ko: 아니요, 박사님! 리처드도 콩도 안 보여요

translation.en: but I call 911 and they are sending a medivac--
-[Kong coughing] -[Anita gasps] I see them!
translation.ko: 구급대에 전화했더니 헬기를 보낸대요 찾았어요! 콩이 리처드를 실험실에서 데리고 나오네요

translation.en: Kong is carrying Richard out of your lab!
translation.ko: 찾았어요! 콩이 리처드를 실험실에서 데리고 나오네요

translation.en: Sí, Richard is definitely alive!
I'm sorry, I wish I could tell you.
Only Richard and Kong know what really happened in there.
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 일인지는 리처드와 콩만 알아요

translation.en: Anita, did you talk to Dad?
Sí, the operation was a success.
Your brother will be all right.
[sighs] You hear that, Kong?
-Thanks to you, Richard's okay! -[Kong hoots]
[sighs] Lukas...
I am afraid Richard told your father that it was all Kong's fault.
translation.ko: 리처드가 아빠한테 콩이 한 짓이라고 했어

translation.en: [stammers] What? No way!
Your brother said he saw Kong go into the lab
translation.ko: 콩이 실험실로 들어가는 걸 리처드가 봤다고 했어

translation.en: and he was just trying to stop him.
-I don't believe it. -[Kong grunts] Kong would never disobey Dad,
translation.ko: 못 믿겠어요, 콩은 아빠 말 거역 안 해요

translation.en: even if there was something in the lab he wanted, which there isn't!
translation.ko: 실험실에 원하는 게 있어도 안 들어간다고요

translation.en: Richard has begged your father to get rid of Kong for causing the accident.
translation.ko: 리처드가 아빠한테 콩을 없애라고 애걸하고 있어

translation.en: Come on, Anita, we both know Richard's lying.
I just can't let anything bad happen to Kong.
translation.ko: 콩이 나쁜 일을 당하는 걸 두고 볼 순 없어요

translation.en: Your father said Richard will need to be away for some time.
translation.ko: 아빠가 리처드를 잠시 다른 데로 보내신대

translation.en: But he should be as good as new...
thanks to advancements in bionics.
Bionics? You mean Richard will be--
Chatter, first bionic bird! Bawk!
Richard, first bionic boy! Bawk!
[gasps] Oh, Richard.
[Anita sniffles] I can't believe I have to say goodbye to one of my boys.
translation.ko: 귀여운 꼬마들 중 하나를 보내야 한다니

translation.en: I know, Anita. It's hard for all of us.
Son, I understand why your mother wants you living in Boston with her, but...
translation.ko: 리처드, 엄마가 왜 너를 보스턴으로 불렀는지 알지만

translation.en: please. I wish you'd change your mind and stay with us.
translation.ko: 제발 마음을 바꿔서 여기 있으면 안 되겠니?

translation.en: Me, too. Come on, Richard, don't go. We can work it out.
translation.ko: 그래, 리처드 가지 마, 잘될 거야

translation.en: [Richard] Okay, I'll stay...
if Kong goes!
[Lukas groans] You know he can't!
This is the only place Kong's safe.
Dad, how can you stick up for that disgusting ape after what he did to me?
translation.ko: 아빠, 콩이 내게 한 짓을 보고도 그냥 두시게요?

translation.en: Enough, Richard.
I found your dinosaur model.
I know what you did.
Kong saved your life.
Well, I'm glad I'm going!
I'm tired of living in this dumb forest, in this ugly house,
translation.ko: 이 구질구질한 숲에서 사는 거 지겹다고요!

translation.en: having to share everything with my brother and his stinking ape!
translation.ko: 루커스와 지저분한 원숭이와 사는 것도 짜증 나고요!

translation.en: [Leo] Take it easy, Richard!
Everything will be okay.
I'll see you often.
With all the advancements we're making in bionics and prosthetics,
why, it won't be long before you're looking like your old self again.
translation.ko: 머지않아 네 본모습을 찾을 수 있을 거야

translation.en: I'm glad I look different.
I hated being a twin.
Last report said that the storm may force rescuers to abandon the search.
translation.ko: "10년 후" 뉴스에서 폭풍 때문에 구조 작업을 중단한대요

translation.en: I pray they can find the missing campers in time.
I'm so grateful you called Lukas to come help.
[Leo chuckles] Well, luckily, he wasn't too far away.
You know they were wrapping up a whale rescue in Alaska?
They had just delivered the injured beluga
translation.ko: 내가 전화했을 때 상처 입은 흰돌고래를

translation.en: to the marine sanctuary in Seattle when I called.
Good to see you, son.
You too, Dad.
[laughs] Hey, bro! You miss me?
Ahhh! Yuck, yuck, yuck, yuck, yuck!
[laughs] Okay, that was seriously gross. Even for you, big guy.
translation.ko: 아무리 너라도 진짜 역겹다 이 친구야

translation.en: Good to see you again, Dr. Remy. You too, Anita.
Thanks for getting here so quickly, Jonesy.
I know how important your rescue work is.
translation.ko: 아주 중요한 일을 하는 거 아네

translation.en: Well, we couldn't have saved half the animals without your bionics,
translation.ko: 박사님의 생체공학이 없었으면 반도 못 구했겠죠

translation.en: so let's call it even, sir.
Now, don't forget to give credit to Lukas' brother, Richard.
He's made incredible advancements in bionics and robotics
translation.ko: 지난 3년 동안 생체공학 로봇 분야 발전에

translation.en: in my lab for the past three years.
translation.ko: 지난 3년 동안 생체공학 로봇 분야 발전에 크게 이바지했지

translation.en: None of us would be able to do what we do without Richard's--
Storm's building fast, we need to move.
If we don't find the missing campers soon, they'll freeze up there tonight.
translation.ko: 실종자들을 빨리 못 찾으면 밤새 얼어 죽을 거예요

translation.en: According to reports,
they were last seen headed towards a place called Edgewood Ravine.
translation.ko: 마지막으로 목격됐을 때 에지우드 라빈이란 곳으로 향하고 있었대

translation.en: Yeah, Kong and I used to hike there.
Until we realized how unstable the entire area is.
translation.ko: 불안정한 지역인 걸 알고 안 갔어

translation.en: Doesn't take much to trigger a landslide.
Bro, you need to stay here with Dad and Anita.
Lay low, make sure none of the searchers see you, okay?
translation.ko: 구조대 눈에 안 띄게 조심하고, 알았지?

translation.en: Roger that.
Bad news. Storm's already grounded the rest of the rescue teams.
translation.ko: 알았다, 오버 안 좋은 소식이야 폭풍 때문에 구조팀이 다 철수했대

translation.en: Looks like we're their only hope. Heat sensors picking up anything?
translation.ko: 이젠 우리밖에 없어 열 감지기가 뭘 좀 잡아냈어?

translation.en: Ah... no.
translation.ko: 열 감지기가 뭘 좀 잡아냈어? 아니

translation.en: The cliffs are loaded with shallow caves that make the sensors useless.
translation.ko: "생명체 감지 없음" 절벽에 얕은 동굴이 많아 센서가 안 들어

translation.en: Daddy, it's getting really cold.
I want to go home, please.
Honey, I told you, we can't move because of the landslide.
translation.ko: 산사태 위험 때문에 움직일 수 없다고 했잖아

translation.en: But I'm sure Mommy has rescue teams looking for us.
translation.ko: 엄마와 구조대가 우리를 찾고 있을 거야

translation.en: We just need to stay safe until they come.
I hear something!
It sounds like a helicopter!
Not sure how much more she can take.
We can't give up, Jonesy.
-Hey, who said anything about-- -[alarm beeping]
-What is it? -Main thrusters are down.
The backup can't handle this kind of beating much longer.
I'm sorry, Lukas, but if we don't head back now,
translation.ko: 미안해, 루커스 지금 안 돌아가면 헬기가 추락하고 말 거야

translation.en: they'll be searching for our wreckage at first light.
translation.ko: 지금 안 돌아가면 헬기가 추락하고 말 거야

translation.en: [girl] Don't leave! We're here!
Help! We're stuck!
Daddy, what are we gonna do now?
-[children gasp] -Did you hear something?
Daddy! It's Bigfoot!
No way, it looks like my little monkey doll...
only way bigger.
Well, whatever it is, kids, it's clearly risking its life to get to us.
translation.ko: 뭔진 몰라도 기를 쓰고 우리 쪽으로 오고 있어

translation.en: Or maybe it's super hungry and we look tasty.
He wants us to climb on!
I think we should trust him.
Thank you.
See? He's saving us!
Go on, Donny.
This amazing creature is our last... and only hope.
translation.ko: 이 친구가 우리의 마지막이자 유일한 희망이야

translation.en: It's gonna be okay now, Donny.
We're saved.
-[man yelps] -[children yelling] Daddy!
We're okay!
Are you okay?
Everything checked out. Chopper's ready to go.
Then let's do it!
But it'd be a miracle if they survived the freezing temperatures up there last night.
translation.ko: 그들이 어제 그 추위를 견뎌냈다면 기적일 거야

translation.en: Looks like they had a great big beautiful ape keeping them warm!
translation.ko: 거대하고 멋진 원숭이 덕에 따뜻하게 지낸 거 같은데

translation.en: What in the world is that thing?
That, my friends, is an amazing hero that just saved three lives!
translation.ko: 세 명의 목숨을 구한 영웅이지 뭐겠어?

translation.en: [kissing loudly] We love you.
[kissing loudly] You're the best.
[grunts] Proud of you, bro!
[chuckling] Even though you didn't exactly lay low.
translation.ko: 눈에 띄지 말라는 말은 안 들었지만

translation.en: [girl] We will never forget you.
You gotta know this is gonna go viral,
so looks like the whole world's about to meet your big bro.
translation.ko: 전 세계가 네 동생을 만나게 되겠는걸

translation.en: What's that saying?
"No good deed goes unpunished."
This magnificent creature risked his life to save my family.
translation.ko: 이 거대한 생명체가 제 가족을 구했어요

translation.en: Kong is a real live superhero.
[Richard] Oh, I can't believe what I'm hearing.
While there are many demanding that this incredibly powerful
and potentially dangerous wild beast be destroyed,
translation.ko: 일각에선 이 힘세고 잠재적으로 위험한 야생짐승을 없애라고 주장하고 있지만

translation.en: the governor's office admits
translation.ko: 한편으론 주지사에게 이 생명체를 구해 달라는

translation.en: that pleas to spare its life are pouring in from around the world.
translation.ko: 한편으론 주지사에게 이 생명체를 구해 달라는 청원이 전 세계에서 빗발치고 있습니다

translation.en: -[Richard] Sound off. -[TV mutes]
[Richard] Why can't they see that freak for what he really is?
translation.ko: 왜 사람들은 저 괴물의 실체를 못 볼까?

translation.en: Pictures do not lie...
unless they are frauds.
You mean like you, Botila?
Negative, I am very real.
I am the most highly advanced bionobot in the known universe.
translation.ko: 난 세상에서 가장 뛰어난 생체공학 로봇이라고요

translation.en: Yes, I get that, I created you.
And don't ever forget it.
Sound up.
[reporter on TV] We are going live to Dr. Leo Remy's home in the California Redwoods,
translation.ko: 캘리포니아 레드우즈에 있는 레미 박사의 자택에서

translation.en: where authorities are attempting to capture the gigantic ape
translation.ko: 콩이라 알려진 이 거대한 생명체를 당국이

translation.en: now known as Kong.
Okay. This is more like it.
Commissioner, please, Kong hasn't done anything!
translation.ko: 청장님, 부탁입니다 콩은 아무 짓도 안 했어요

translation.en: [Anita blows raspberry] Of course he has.
translation.ko: 콩은 아무 짓도 안 했어요 안 하긴요

translation.en: Kong just saved two beautiful little children and their daddy.
translation.ko: 콩은 예쁜 두 아이와 애들 아빠를 구한걸요

translation.en: And this is how you thank him?
[Chatter] Take cover! Bawk! Awk!
I give you my word, Kong is completely harmless!
translation.ko: 내 약속하리다 콩은 절대 해를 끼치지 않아요

translation.en: Dr. Remy, we've been down this road before.
translation.ko: 레미 박사님 전에도 이런 얘기 했죠

translation.en: Yes, when you were still a police captain.
Congratulations on your promotion, Commissioner Decker.
Uh, thanks, Doc.
But I'll be back pounding a beat
if you can't get that beast of yours to surrender.
[man] Let me out of here! Help!
Dr. Remy, I need that thing to put my men down right now!
translation.ko: 박사님, 당장 내 부하들 내려놓으라고 해요!

translation.en: Understood.
But I need your officers to back down.
[Decker] My men will be forced to open fire!
Stop! What are you doing?
Protecting my little boy!
Hold your fire!
You put those nice policemen down this instant!
I mean it! Or no more cookies ever!
Do it for me, please, mi hijo! Por tu Anita!
[Anita gasps] That's my good boy.
I am going to bake you the biggest batch of banana chip cookies!
translation.ko: 세상에서 제일 큰 바나나 칩 쿠키 구워 줄게

translation.en: He not only obeyed, but he actually seemed to understand her.
translation.ko: 복종만 하는 게 아니라 애니타의 말을 알아듣는 거 같군요

translation.en: But what would have happened if she wasn't here?
It could have ended very badly!
[laughing] Hey, he's like my two-year-old nephew.
translation.ko: 꼭 두 살배기 내 조카 같군요

translation.en: Actually, Commissioner,
Kong's mind is on par with a two- or three-year-old human child.
translation.ko: 콩은 정신연령이 두세 살 아이와 같아요

translation.en: What's most important, as you can see,
he understands the difference between right and wrong.
translation.ko: 콩은 옳고 그름을 판단할 수 있단 거예요

translation.en: So the question is, what to do with this giant?
translation.ko: 그럼 저 거대한 짐승을 어떡하면 좋죠?

translation.en: There's still a lot of people demanding
that the governor do something about this threat.
translation.ko: 위협적인 동물을 없애라는 청원이 주지사에게 자꾸 들어와서요

translation.en: Tell him I promise to find a way.
[Decker] Trouble is, we don't really have a facility
translation.ko: 저 친구를 수용할 정도로 크고 튼튼한 곳이

translation.en: big enough or strong enough to hold him.
translation.ko: 저 친구를 수용할 정도로 크고 튼튼한 곳이 없다는 게 문제긴 하네요

translation.en: Hmm, yes. Ah!
But what about the most famous, inescapable prison ever built?
Alcatraz.
[reporter] In the last few weeks, literally tens of thousands of people
translation.ko: 지난 몇 주 동안 관광객 수만 명이

translation.en: have flocked to San Francisco from all around the world
in hopes of catching a glimpse of the giant ape
that, ironically, has been exiled to Alcatraz Island.
translation.ko: 이 거대한 유인원을 보기 위해서인데요 "네가 최고야!"

translation.en: In appreciation for the outpouring of support,
Dr. Leo Remy has built a special tower
translation.ko: 리오 레미 박사는 콩이 올라갈 수 있도록

translation.en: in the center of the island for Kong to climb...
...making it easier for the world to see this freak of nature.
translation.ko: 바로 이 기이한 생명체가 잘 보이도록 말이죠

translation.en: It would appear Kong, King of the Apes, is a born entertainer.
translation.ko: 유인원의 왕인 콩은 타고난 광대인 듯합니다

translation.en: Perhaps that's why rumors are flying
that Alcatraz Island may soon be transformed into Kong Island.
translation.ko: 곧 '콩 섬'이 될 거란 소문도 나돌고 있습니다

translation.en: [Lukas laughing] Good to see you, too, you big show-off!
Hey, Dad, everything okay? What's the big news?
translation.ko: 아버지, 별일 없죠? 하실 얘기가 뭐예요?

translation.en: I've been wondering the same thing.
Richard.
Lukas.
I need your help,
both my sons, to fulfill my lifelong dream.
translation.ko: 너희 둘이 내 일생의 꿈을 이루게 해 줘

translation.en: Thanks to Kong's extraordinary fame,
I have the governor's blessing, plus all the funding needed,
translation.ko: 주지사의 승인은 물론 바로 이 섬에

translation.en: to create the Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve
right here on the island!
That's great, Dad!
But, son, there is one major condition.
They insist Kong be fitted with a special control collar.
No, no, no, forget that!
Lukas, it's the only way.
Kong wears a collar or they will...
put him away.
Richard, I assured them that you could design the control collar for me.
translation.ko: 리처드, 네가 목걸이를 만들 거라고 얘기해 뒀다

translation.en: It will be my pleasure to do this for you, Dad.
Lukas, we have the opportunity to create a real and lasting sanctuary
translation.ko: 루커스 너와 존시가 구조하는 다치고 불쌍한 동물들이

translation.en: for the injured and endangered species you and Jonesy rescue.
translation.ko: 안심하고 지낼 수 있는 보호구역을 만들 수 있어

translation.en: A safe haven to protect against future extinctions.
translation.ko: 그렇게 되면 멸종 위기에서 벗어날 수도 있어 리처드, 너는 네 뛰어난 로봇 제작 기술로

translation.en: Richard, with your exceptional talents in robotics,
translation.ko: 리처드, 너는 네 뛰어난 로봇 제작 기술로

translation.en: you'll be able to bring natural history to life like never before.
translation.ko: 과거의 동물들을 재현할 수 있을 거야

translation.en: You could create all of the life-size dinosaurs you always dreamed of.
translation.ko: 네가 꿈꾸던 실물 크기의 공룡도 만들 수 있고

translation.en: So, what do you say?
Well, I'm certainly not going to be the one that stands in the way
translation.ko: 전 아버지의 꿈을 방해할 생각이 전혀 없어요

translation.en: of my father's dream.
Sure, Dad.
I'll help you create... Kong Island.
The Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve.
[scoffs] Yeah, tell it to them.
Hey, I'm Doug Jones. My friends call me Jonesy.
translation.ko: 난 더그 존스예요 친구들은 존시라 불러요

translation.en: Botila. I do not have friends.
Uh, trust me, Jonesy, you really don't want to fall for that one.
I'd never make a move on your brother's woman.
translation.ko: 네 쌍둥이 형제의 애인한테 그런 짓 안 해

translation.en: [laughs] How about his bionobot?
Say what? You mean she's...
-[exclaims] Unreal! -[Lukas] Exactly.
translation.ko: - 말도 안 돼 - 내 말이 침입자 경고!

translation.en: [automated voice on PA] Intruder alert! Intruder alert!
-Our security walls have been breached! -[Richard] Hmm.
See? Not everyone is a fan.
There have also been many threats against your ape.
translation.ko: 네 원숭이를 위협하는 움직임도 만만치 않아

translation.en: Sounds like someone plans to make good on one.
translation.ko: 누가 행동에 옮기기로 한 것 같군

translation.en: We keep these on board to warn off poachers in the wild.
translation.ko: 밀렵꾼 쫓을 때 쓰는 건데 여기 둬야겠어

translation.en: No, Botila will handle them.
I programmed her with every known martial arts move.
I have a few belts of my own, maybe we can work out together sometime.
translation.ko: 나도 무술 좀 하는데 언제 같이 연습해요

translation.en: As long as Kong is around, we don't need weapons or Botila.
translation.ko: 콩만 있으면 무기도 보틸라도 필요 없어

translation.en: Who are you and what do you want?
Sorry to trespass, but you are a very hard man to reach, Dr. Remy.
translation.ko: 허락 없이 와서 죄송해요 정말 연락이 안 되더라고요 레미 박사님

translation.en: I am Dr. Amy Quon and this is my brother, Danny.
translation.ko: 전 에이미 콴 박사고 이쪽은 제 동생인 대니예요

translation.en: Nice to meet you. Now get off our island.
Kong, dump them back in their boat or whatever they used to trespass.
translation.ko: 콩, 어서 저 사람들을 타고 온 배에 던져

translation.en: He says, "Do it yourself." He doesn't work for you.
translation.ko: 콩이 직접 하라는데요 당신 부하 아니라고요

translation.en: [scoffs] I suppose you came here to say this boy can talk to apes.
translation.ko: 이 꼬마가 원숭이와 대화를 한다는 걸 증명하러 왔나?

translation.en: Kong's the first ape I ever met, but yeah, turns out I can.
[laughs] You know, you guys got a seriously funny gorilla here.
I've heard enough of this nonsense. Time to throw them out.
translation.ko: 헛소리 그만 집어치워 어서 던져 버리라니까

translation.en: Actually, I want to hear more.
I'm rather curious myself.
So, Danny, what else is Kong telling you?
That he really wants you to let me and my sis work here with him.
translation.ko: 저와 누나를 여기서 일하게 해 주라고 하네요

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, I made that up.
But I'm pretty sure he would have said it if he knew that's why we came.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 우리가 온 이유를 알면 그렇게 말했을걸요

translation.en: [Lukas] How the heck did he know what Kong was saying?
translation.ko: 콩이 뭐라고 하는지 도대체 어떻게 안 거지?

translation.en: Danny is a certified animal whisperer,
and I'm a licensed veterinarian, specializing in primates,
particularly anthropoids.
But, as you know, there are hardly any left in the world.
Just a few in zoos and none that we know of in the wild.
And certainly no creature on Earth like Kong.
translation.ko: 그리고 지구에 콩 같은 생명체는 없어요

translation.en: I will do anything to be part of his team.
translation.ko: 이 팀에 넣어 주시면 뭐든 하겠어요

translation.en: She means, "We will."
-[Kong laughing] -Oh, man! I'm gonna need hazard pay and a snot protector.
[laughs] I'm not kidding!
We will, of course, need to verify your credentials,
but I was already planning to bring on a vet
to care for the injured and endangered animals
Lukas and Jonesy will be bringing to the preserve.
If you check out, you're in.
I promise, we both will.
And it looks like Kong's already hired himself a translator.
translation.ko: 콩이 벌써 통역가를 구한 것 같은데

translation.en: Amy and Danny Quon...
welcome to the team.
[Danny] Shake on it, mega broski!
Let them laugh now.
They won't be laughing when I'm finished with that hideous ape.
translation.ko: 저 원숭이를 처치하면 웃음기가 싹 가실 테니

translation.en: Come on, Dad. You can't do this to him.
translation.ko: 제발요, 아빠 콩에게 이럴 순 없어요

translation.en: I'm sorry, Lukas.
But either Kong wears the control collar Richard made for him or he--
translation.ko: 하지만 콩이 리처드가 만든 목걸이를 안 차면...

translation.en: Just relax.
As long as your ape behaves himself, we'll never have to use this.
translation.ko: 네 원숭이가 얌전하게만 군다면 이건 필요도 없어

translation.en: But, if he does get out of hand,
the pain I can inflict will bring Kong to his knees.
translation.ko: 내가 가하는 고통에 무릎을 꿇게 될걸

translation.en: Dad, you know Kong doesn't deserve this.
[sighs] This is so wrong.
I can't watch.
Hey, buddy, I know how you feel.
Amy made me wear a tie once... Totally hated it.
translation.ko: 나도 누나 때문에 넥타이 찼을 때 진짜 싫었어

translation.en: [Danny] Help!
[chuckles] It's okay. But you better leave that collar alone.
Don't look so bummed.
At least now the Remys can start turning this rock into Kong Island!
translation.ko: 레미 박사님이 이 돌섬을 콩 섬으로 만들고 있잖아

translation.en: -Finger five? -[grunts unhappily]
Aw, come on, man, give it up!
'Cause very soon you're gonna be a full-blown superstar!
translation.ko: 얼마 안 있으면 넌 슈퍼스타가 될 거야

translation.en: Just don't forget, I knew you when...
Can you believe how fast this place is coming together?
-[pipes clattering] -[workers yelling]
[workers sighing] Thank you!
You may loath Kong, but you must admit... he is quite the hero.
translation.ko: 콩을 싫어하는 거 알지만 솔직히 영웅이잖아요

translation.en: He's nothing but a dumb ape.
Look at him. He's pathetic.
By my calculations,
that dumb, pathetic ape just saved you 20 man-hours of highly-skilled labor.
translation.ko: 제 계산으로는 저 꼴사나운 원숭이가 숙련된 일꾼 스무 명 몫을 해요

translation.en: [Leo] I am so proud of you, son.
Then wait until you see...
this!
[Leo] I remember when you were a boy, you said
translation.ko: 네가 어렸을 때 그랬지 언젠가는 네 발명품이 내 걸 능가할 거라고

translation.en: your inventions would one day surpass mine.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 네 발명품이 내 걸 능가할 거라고

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, congratulations, son.
You've finally done it.
[Anita] Hey, Dr. Remy, what are you doing here?
You are too pale. You should be in bed, eating the chicken soup I made for you.
translation.ko: 제가 만든 치킨 수프 드시고 누워 계셔야죠

translation.en: I... [coughing] I'm fine, Anita.
Just... just a little tired is all.
For so many months now, you are working much too hard.
All of you.
Not me. I have an inexhaustible energy source.
-[chuckles] I bet you do. -Okay.
Richard, we're ready for this big show you've been promising.
translation.ko: 좋아, 리처드 네가 약속한 큰 쇼라는 게 도대체 뭐야?

translation.en: Botila, activate the mobile control panel.
This is what everyone will witness at tomorrow's grand opening
of the Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve.
translation.ko: 개관 행사 때 모두가 이걸 보게 될 거야

translation.en: [Danny sighs] Why can't that guy ever just call it what it is?
translation.ko: 왜 진짜 이름으로 부르지 않는 거지?

translation.en: Kong Island.
Lukas? Earth to Lukas.
[chuckles] Are you okay?
I was just remembering how fun it was being a kid with Kong.
translation.ko: 콩과 어릴 때 즐거웠던 기억이 떠올랐어

translation.en: He's still like a big kid.
translation.ko: 콩은 아직도 몸집만 큰 애 같아

translation.en: Get ready, you are about to see what I am certain the media will call
the greatest attraction in theme park history.
translation.ko: 가장 대단한 곳이라고 찬사를 보낼 테니까

translation.en: Perfect! Aren't they realistic?
This is the reaction I'll get tomorrow from the media and guests.
translation.ko: 내일 언론과 방문객들이 한입으로 이렇게 말하겠지

translation.en: Richard, are you... [coughing]
...are you absolutely certain it will be completely safe for the public?
translation.ko: 정말 관람객들에게 전혀 위험하지 않은 거지?

translation.en: Of course.
Don't you trust me?
[grunts] I think he's after me!
Stop that, you dumb ape, before you damage it!
translation.ko: 이 멍청한 원숭이! 고장 내기만 해 봐!

translation.en: Make that expensive toy of yours back off before someone gets hurt!
translation.ko: 누구 다치기 전에 저 장난감 당장 거둬들여!

translation.en: Ugh, bring it down.
Negative. Not possible. There is no override button.
[sighs] Nice right hook, dude!
That pterodactyl was programmed to lead the air show tomorrow.
translation.ko: 저 프테로닥틸은 내일 에어쇼에 출연할 거였다고

translation.en: There isn't nearly enough time to replace it.
That filthy ape destroyed everything again!
translation.ko: 저 멍청한 원숭이가 또 다 망쳤다고

translation.en: Now, it will be fine.
You still have many more pterodactyls,
plus, I'm sure everyone will be awed by all your other amazing creatures.
translation.ko: 네가 만든 다른 것들을 보면 모두 감탄할 거야

translation.en: You know, Richard, if you don't want Kong to break your toys,
translation.ko: 리처드, 콩이 네 장난감 부수는 게 싫거든

translation.en: maybe you shouldn't use them to torment him.
Everyone who is anyone is here, the mayor, governor,
translation.ko: 이름 있는 사람은 다 모였습니다 시장, 주지사와 배우 유명인이 셀 수도 없습니다

translation.en: and frankly, too many movie stars and celebrities to count...
translation.ko: 시장, 주지사와 배우 유명인이 셀 수도 없습니다

translation.en: All here to congratulate Dr. Leo Remy
on his latest and unquestionably greatest achievement.
In addition to becoming a sanctuary
for many of the world's remaining endangered species,
a massive aquarium encircles the island,
created to protect all kinds of marine life.
translation.ko: 온갖 종류의 해양 생물을 보호하고 있습니다

translation.en: The Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve,
already more commonly referred to as "Kong Island,"
translation.ko: 별명인 '콩 섬'으로 더 많이 알려진 이곳에선

translation.en: is also home to many extinct species,
such as prehistoric dinosaurs. Pterodactyls, triceratops,
and even Tyrannosaurus rex!
Of course they are all just harmless bionobots created by Dr. Richard Remy.
translation.ko: 모두 리처드 레미 박사가 만든 생체공학 로봇이죠

translation.en: Like the terrifying megalodons and other prehistoric sea creatures.
translation.ko: 무시무시한 메갈로돈 등 많은 선사시대 해양 생물과

translation.en: And even a monstrous giant squid,
programmed to shock and delight visitors arriving on the monorail.
translation.ko: 모노레일을 탄 관람객들에게 공포와 즐거움을 선사합니다

translation.en: Everyone is suitably awed by all of the life-size dinosaurs and marine monsters.
translation.ko: 모두 실물 크기의 공룡과 해양 생물을 즐깁니다

translation.en: But, clearly, everyone has come to see Kong.
translation.ko: 하지만 이들은 모두 콩을 보러 왔습니다

translation.en: The one and only living, breathing King of the Apes!
[scoffs] I taught him that!
We call it, "The mega butt bow."
[laughing] Looks like a real crowd pleaser.
Your dad looks pretty pleased, too.
Well, Dr. Remy, you pulled it off.
Congratulations!
Definitely a monumental day for the Remy family.
Yeah, so I wonder where Richard is.
[Lukas] I figured he'd be eating up all this press.
It seems very few people are interested in your artificial dinosaurs,
now that Kong has appeared.
Everything would be different
if they had been able to witness my spectacular pterodactyl air show.
translation.ko: 프테로닥틸의 멋진 에어쇼를 보여 줬다면 반응이 달랐을 거라고

translation.en: Perhaps.
However, for some incalculable reason,
humans are not simply fascinated by Kong, they are drawn to him.
translation.ko: 사람들은 단순히 콩을 좋아하는 게 아니라 완전히 푹 빠진 거 같아요

translation.en: Because most of them are just ignorant fools,
willing to pay to watch a freak of nature with less intelligence than a three-year-old!
translation.ko: 세 살 지능도 안 되는 동물을 보려고 돈을 내다니

translation.en: Ordinary people, like my brother, are weak, and deserve to become extinct.
translation.ko: 루커스처럼 평범하고 약한 인간들은 멸종돼야 해

translation.en: The same as all the useless creatures he's always trying to save!
Bionics and robotics are the future.
I will not argue with that.
And one day I will prove it to him and the world...
translation.ko: 내가 루커스와 전 세계에 그걸 증명하고 말 거야

translation.en: Congratulations, Dr. Remy, on your phenomenal success.
[stammers] Now, most of the credit goes to my two sons,
translation.ko: 아니요, 거의 모두가 제 두 아들 덕분입니다

translation.en: Lukas and Richard,
who I know will keep my dream alive long after I am gone.
translation.ko: 제가 세상을 떠난 후에도 제 꿈을 이어갈 것입니다

translation.en: Nearly one year to the day
that the Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve opened,
translation.ko: 개관한 지 일 년이 지난 지금

translation.en: its founder, Dr. Leo Remy, has passed.
translation.ko: 설립자 리오 레미 박사가 세상을 떠났습니다

translation.en: [Lukas] I know, bro...
I miss him, too.
[Richard] I'll make your dream come true.
You mean yours.
[Richard] Find someplace else to put that thing.
Construction on my new dinosaur habitat starts today.
translation.ko: 새 공룡 서식지를 오늘부터 지을 거예요

translation.en: Lukas didn't say anything about moving the seal.
translation.ko: 루커스는 물개를 옮기란 말 안 하던데요

translation.en: I'm the boss while my brother is away!
[Lukas shouting] What are you doing?
Don't tell me you're trying to take away this poor creature's habitat!
translation.ko: 불쌍한 물개의 서식지를 없애려는 건 아니겠지

translation.en: It's okay, Abe, the seal is staying right here.
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 에이브 물개는 여기 있을 거예요

translation.en: We are supposed to be entertaining our visitors.
One useless seal is about as exciting as watching paint dry.
translation.ko: 이 쓸모없는 물개는 오락거리가 안 돼

translation.en: Animals aren't just for your entertainment, Richard.
And, anyway, don't worry, Jonesy and I plan to rescue a lot more.
translation.ko: 그리고 존시와 내가 더 많이 구조할 거야

translation.en: You could have a hundred,
but it can't compare to the prehistoric shark show I've designed.
translation.ko: 내가 디자인한 선사시대 상어 쇼와는 비교가 안 돼

translation.en: [Danny laughs] Yeah, right.
A fake-looking old shark.
You keep forgetting,
Dad's dream was for us to save as many animals as we can from extinction.
translation.ko: 아버지는 멸종 위기의 동물을 구조하라고 하셨어

translation.en: I suppose one of them did that to you?
No, the poachers trying to exterminate her did,
translation.ko: 이건 밀렵꾼들이 쏜 총에 맞아서 그런 거야

translation.en: which is why we need more sanctuary space, not less.
Which is what I came to talk about in the first place!
translation.ko: 실은 너한테 그 얘기를 하러 온 거야

translation.en: On the flight home, I decided to go over the books.
Turns out, you've already exceeded your bionobot budget by several million.
translation.ko: 넌 생체공학 로봇 예산을 수백만 달러 초과했어

translation.en: You can't stop me.
We're equal partners. Equal vote in the business.
You forget, Dad left Anita 10%.
Anita agrees with me.
The real animals come first.
And don't even think about trying something like this again
when I'm away on a rescue mission.
This isn't over.
Actually, it is, Richard...
so live with it.
And now, I've got to go see how the ligers we rescued are doing.
translation.ko: 내가 구조한 라이거가 어떤지 가 봐야겠어

translation.en: -[both gasp] -[Danny] Ligers?
Botila!
Botila?
Where is that blasted bot?
translation.ko: 이 멍청한 로봇은 어디 간 거야?

translation.en: [Danny] I can't believe I'm going to get a chance to communicate with a real, live hybrid!
translation.ko: 이종교배 동물을 실제로 보다니 정말 신나

translation.en: Wonder which language it's gonna speak, lion or tiger? [laughing]
translation.ko: 무슨 말로 소통할까? 사자 말? 호랑이 말?

translation.en: [Jonesy] Maybe you can ask her.
Easy, everyone, we do not want to frighten the cats.
translation.ko: 다들 진정해 - 겁주면 안 돼 - 이름은 지었어요?

translation.en: -What are their names? -Your sister decided
translation.ko: - 겁주면 안 돼 - 이름은 지었어요? 에이미는 얘가 아름답고 당당하다고

translation.en: that since she's such a beautiful and majestic creature,
we should call her, "Lady." Sweet!
So, how come you guys had to rescue Lady?
Unfortunately, some people think it's cool to have an exotic pet.
translation.ko: 독특한 동물을 애완용으로 기르려는 사람들이 있어

translation.en: Then, when they discover how dangerous they can be,
they release them into the wild,
without realizing most of these animals never learn to survive in nature.
translation.ko: 그런데 얘들은 야생에서 사는 법을 못 배웠거든

translation.en: Especially not with poachers hunting them.
Kong, you better back off.
Danny, see if you can talk to her.
translation.ko: 대니 네가 얘기 좀 해 봐

translation.en: All right.
Attagirl! Whoa!
[laughs] That's one big puddy cat!
It's okay now.
She gets that you're just an overgrown softy.
And so is this lovable little fella.
They were very lucky you found them when you did.
Another day, and...
Hey, that's a perfect name for you! Lucky!
[Danny] Uh, Kong wants to feed him.
Okay, but be very careful.
You don't want to scare him.
You're right, Amy, something's off.
I've examined Kong repeatedly and found no physical reason for his attitude shift.
translation.ko: 계속 관찰했는데 갑자기 저러는 이유를 모르겠어

translation.en: He could just be missing Lukas and Danny.
translation.ko: 루커스와 대니가 보고 싶어서 그런 걸까?

translation.en: It's the first time your brother's been away since you got here.
I know. Danny couldn't pass up the chance to see what's left of the Amazon.
translation.ko: 대니도 아마존을 볼 마지막 기회를 놓칠 순 없었어

translation.en: Lukas has even begun teaching him to fly.
I've never seen the big guy act like this.
translation.ko: 저렇게 행동하는 건 본 적이 없어

translation.en: Maybe we should call them back.
Why not get Danny on the holo-screen?
See if he can "read" Kong, or whatever he does.
translation.ko: 콩의 행동을 읽을 수 있을지 모르잖아

translation.en: Let's do it.
[Amy on monitor] So, we're hoping Danny can tell us what's wrong.
translation.ko: 대니가 무슨 일인지 알 수 있을까 하고

translation.en: Afraid we can't come back yet.
They're clear-cutting one of the last sections of rainforest,
and we're hoping to get there before the poachers close in.
translation.ko: 밀렵꾼들이 몰려오기 전에 먼저 도착해야 해

translation.en: But I can try talking to Kong over the link.
translation.ko: 영상으로 콩과 얘기해 볼 수는 있어

translation.en: See if I can get the big guy to tell me what's up.
Okay, here you go.
-[grunting] -[Jonesy] Come on, Kong. Don't you want to say hi to Lukas and Danny?
Yo, Kong-O!
You bent out of shape 'cause I took off with your bro?
[laughs] Promise I'll make it up to you
with the biggest super-sized banana smoothie on the planet!
translation.ko: 지구에서 제일 큰 바나나 스무디 만들어 줄게

translation.en: I can't believe Kong would blow me off like that.
I think we'd better move Lady and her cub out of Kong's habitat. Just in case.
Maybe we should come back right now.
[Jonesy] I'd hate to see you abandon the mission when you're so close.
We'll keep a sharp eye on Kong, but if he gets any worse,
translation.ko: 우리가 콩을 잘 살필게 더 나빠지면 바로 돌아와

translation.en: then you'd better come back.
Now that I know my do-gooder brother is far enough away,
it's time to really amp things up.
Increasing the frequency on Kong's control collar.
Wait! Wait!
Not quite yet.
I just wanted to be certain that it would work.
We don't want Amy telling Lukas we need to close the park tomorrow
because his "star attraction" is actually a deadly savage.
translation.ko: 난폭해서 당장 공원을 폐쇄하자고 하면 안 돼

translation.en: Turn it off...
for now.
I warned Lukas it wasn't over, but it will be very soon.
translation.ko: 루커스에게 아직 안 끝났다고 했지만 곧 끝이 날 거야

translation.en: Well, I was monitoring Kong all night. He seemed totally normal.
translation.ko: 밤새 콩을 살펴봤는데 지금은 완전히 정상이야

translation.en: It definitely looks like he's back to his old self. Maybe it was just a bug.
-[crowd cheering] -[Jonesy laughs] Oh, yeah!
The big guy's back.
Good thing, too, because the ticket office says the place is gonna be jammed.
Apparently, Richard ran some kind of one-day-only special promotion deal
translation.ko: 리처드가 내일 하루만 특별 할인을 하기로 했대

translation.en: that's packing them in even tighter than usual.
[Botila] The monorail has stopped running.
The island is now filled to capacity.
Well, then. It's showtime!
-[crowd laughing] -[man] What's he doing?
Someone make him stop!
translation.ko: - 누가 좀 말려요! - 원숭이가 미쳤나 봐

translation.en: -[Jonesy] Take it easy! -Calm down, please!
Look out! Please, be careful!
Lukas!
Can you hear me? Something has happened.
translation.ko: 루커스, 내 말 들려? 일이 생겼어

translation.en: I know. Richard called a few minutes ago to say Kong's going berserk
translation.ko: 콩이 미쳐 날뛴다고 방금 리처드가 연락했어

translation.en: and that everyone's in grave danger.
-But how did Richard... -[screaming continues] -It just started! Oh! -[phone clatters]
-Amy! -I'm okay.
But we need your help.
[Lukas] We're just outside San Francisco.
Last night, Danny and I both had the feeling we needed to get back.
I just hope it will be soon enough.
I can still increase his pain by two full decimals.
translation.ko: 고통의 강도를 두 단계 더 높일 수 있어요

translation.en: Not just yet.
I wouldn't want to accidentally put the beast down... too quickly.
translation.ko: 실수로 저 짐승이 너무 빨리 죽으면 안 돼

translation.en: I am unable to compute your logic.
My extraordinary bionobots need to save these people from the savage monster,
translation.ko: 내 멋진 생체공학 로봇들이 저 괴물에게서 사람들을 구해야지

translation.en: making me the hero of the hour.
Highly logical.
Admirably diabolical.
I am programming them to destroy only their primary target...
Kong!
Ladies and gentlemen, please try to remain calm.
I am Dr. Richard Remy.
Do not fear.
My bionobots will stop Kong.
translation.ko: 제 생체공학 로봇이 콩을 막을 겁니다

translation.en: -[crowd exclaiming] -[man] He's right!
[woman] Thank goodness!
translation.ko: 저길 봐 박사 말이 맞았어 세상에!

translation.en: Yes! Get him!
No! No! That thing's gonna destroy him!
We have to do something!
Believe me, Danny...
I wish we could.
This is not happening!
It is definitely occurring in real time.
Can't you see he's wiping out half my bionobots?
translation.ko: 놈이 생체공학 로봇 절반을 없애고 있잖아

translation.en: It's a rhetorical question, you...
I will make Kong pay for this.
It appears you will need to catch him first.
translation.ko: 먼저 콩을 잡아야 할 것 같은데요

translation.en: By my calculations,
he is planning to use the monorail to escape the island.
Don't just stand there, we have to finish him!
translation.ko: 가만히 서 있지만 말고 콩을 끝장내라고!

translation.en: [Richard] What are you doing now, Botila?
I am covering my audio sensors
in preparation for your 99.9% probable tirade.
Relax, I am perfectly calm.
That... does not compute.
I had hoped to take that filthy ape down myself.
translation.ko: 저 재수 없는 원숭이를 내 손으로 해치우고 싶었지

translation.en: However, a truly wise man knows when it is time to bring in the big guns.
translation.ko: 하지만 정말 현명한 사람은 더 큰 힘을 빌릴 때가 언제인지 잘 알지

translation.en: [Richard] Hurry, Botila!
I want to be front and center
when the military finally shoots down the King of the Apes.
translation.ko: 쏴서 쓰러뜨릴 때 맨 앞에서 보고 싶다고

translation.en: [Botila] Interesting.
It would appear that they will not open fire for fear of hitting civilians.
translation.ko: 민간인들이 다칠까 봐 발포를 안 하는군요

translation.en: They will if Kong goes crazy enough.
What say we push the overgrown ape over the edge... literally?
translation.ko: 저 덩치 큰 원숭이를 좀 자극하면 어떨까?

translation.en: Send it in now!
Time to end this!
No way will he be able to withstand maximum strength for long.
[pilot] Moving in closer for a clean shot.
[Danny grunts] You really sure I've had enough lessons?
You'll be fine, Danny.
When I give the word, veer clear,
then activate the auto-pilot right after I jump.
Say what? Jump?
-Kong! Listen to me, bro. You-- -[grunting]
Danny, get ready.
-Now, go! -Lukas!
Kong! Help me, bro!
Bro!
Thanks! You had me worried there for a sec.
That's good. Okay, now, you need to put down the plane...
-The plane, Kong... -[Kong grunting]
No! Kong, I understand how you feel,
translation.ko: 안 돼, 콩 네 기분 알아

translation.en: but I know you really don't want to hurt anyone.
So put the plane down...
[stutters] gently!
That's good, bro! Very good.
Now, listen to me. Kong, you have to go to our secret place.
translation.ko: 내 말 들어 우리 비밀 은신처로 가

translation.en: Understand? [emphatically] Our secret place!
Trust me.
Trust me.
I'll meet you at our secret place. Understand?
Go! Now!
You did this to Kong!
You'll never be able to prove it.
Get us out of here.
Your hatred has destroyed everything...
as always.
It will take weeks to assess all the damage that savage did
translation.ko: 그 괴물이 이 보호구역과 제 생체공학 로봇에 끼친 피해를 산정하려면 몇 주는 족히 걸려요

translation.en: to the preserve and all my bionobots!
translation.ko: 피해를 산정하려면 몇 주는 족히 걸려요

translation.en: True, but there is little doubt it will amount to tens of millions.
translation.ko: 그렇긴 해도 수천만 달러는 족히 넘을 겁니다

translation.en: Commissioner, it's time that monster paid for everything he's done!
translation.ko: 청장님, 저 괴물이 대가를 치르게 해야 합니다

translation.en: [clears throat] You better believe... Kong will be hunted down and destroyed.
Easy, bro. -It's just your family. -All of us.
[Chatter] Big boy! Bawk! Big trouble!
Chico, I could put you over my knee...
Well, if you wouldn't crush it... For the scare you gave me today.
translation.ko: 엉덩이를 때릴 텐데 얼마나 놀랐는지 알아?

translation.en: [Chatter] Ditto to that, bawk! Ditto that, bawk!
I know it wasn't your fault.
It's that horrible collar Richard put on you.
Good news is, we're out of range of Richard's remote, so he can't keep hurting Kong.
But we still need to figure out how to get it off of him.
I can do it. If Kong will give me a lift.
translation.ko: 콩이 날 들어주면 내가 뗄 수 있어

translation.en: -[Kong grunts nervously] -[Amy] There.
It's really quite simple once you know how.
So, Lukas, where exactly is this secret place you told us about?
translation.ko: 그나저나 루커스 네가 말한 비밀 은신처는 도대체 어디야?

translation.en: Right here.
-Okay, that's totally-- -[Chatter] Awk-some!
translation.ko: 우와! 정말... - 끝내줘 - 콩이 성공한 덕에

translation.en: [Lukas laughs] Thanks to Kong's success,
I was able to finance the last stage of my childhood dream.
translation.ko: 내 어린 시절 꿈의 마지막 단계를 실현했지

translation.en: It renders the fort invisible,
either just from the air, or, as you just saw, from the ground, too.
translation.ko: 공중에서 봐도 절대 안 보이지만 보다시피 땅에서도 안 보여

translation.en: I always figured you boys were building some kind of club house,
translation.ko: 둘이서 오락실 같은 거나 짓는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: but this tree house es increíble.
Tree fortress is more like it. -[shouts] How about giving me the tour? -[Kong grunts happily]
translation.ko: 나무 요새가 더 어울려요 구경 좀 시켜 줄래?

translation.en: So, pal, this place have room for all of us?
translation.ko: 이봐, 친구 우리가 다 묵을 공간은 돼?

translation.en: [chuckles] Look, I really appreciate your help, all of you,
but this is my problem.
[scoffs] We are family. We stick together.
At least until we can find a way to vindicate Kong.
translation.ko: 적어도 콩이 명예를 회복할 때까진 그래야지

translation.en: Thanks, guys.
One hundred seventeen million ninety thousand, two--
[Richard] I've heard enough!
But I have not completed calculating the total damage Kong has--
translation.ko: 하지만 아직 콩이 일으킨 피해를 다 계산하지...

translation.en: Either shut your mouth or I will shut you down.
translation.ko: 네가 입을 안 닫으면 내가 닫아주지

translation.en: Bottom line, it will cost a fortune to rebuild my facility.
translation.ko: 결론을 내자면 내 연구 설비 재건에 큰 액수가 필요해

translation.en: But more importantly, I must replace my bionobots.
translation.ko: 하지만 생체공학 로봇을 만드는 게 더 중요해

translation.en: We need the force and firepower to finish off Kong.
translation.ko: 콩을 없애려면 군대와 더 센 화력이 필요해

translation.en: I am having trouble computing why you are so calm.
translation.ko: 박사님이 왜 이리 침착한지 이해하기 힘들어요

translation.en: Frankly, it makes my circuits "jumpy."
The only logical deduction is that you already have a plan
translation.ko: 유일한 논리적 추론은 이미 돈과 화력을 얻을 계획을 세웠다는 건데

translation.en: for getting both the funds and the firepower.
translation.ko: 이미 돈과 화력을 얻을 계획을 세웠다는 건데

translation.en: With a little help from my brother.
[Richard on monitor] I strongly suggest you surrender Kong to the authorities.
translation.ko: 충고하는데 콩을 당국에 넘기는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: No problem, Richard. Happy to do it, just as soon as you tell
translation.ko: 좋아, 리처드 못 할 거 없지 제어 목걸이로 콩을 화나게 한 걸

translation.en: Police Commissioner Decker and the media
translation.ko: 제어 목걸이로 콩을 화나게 한 걸

translation.en: that you used the control collar to drive Kong mad!
[laughs] Don't be absurd, Lukas.
No one will believe the esteemed Dr. Richard Remy would do such a thing.
translation.ko: 이 리처드 레미 박사가 그랬다곤 아무도 안 믿어

translation.en: Well, if that's what you called to say, then goodbye.
Fine, if you don't care about your ligers anymore...
translation.ko: 좋아, 이제 라이거는 아무래도 괜찮단 거군

translation.en: What? [stutters] What about Lady and Lucky?
Thanks to Kong's vicious rampage, their enclosure was destroyed,
translation.ko: 콩이 미쳐 날뛰는 바람에 우리가 부서졌고

translation.en: so your precious ligers escaped the island.
-Where are they? -I have no idea.
You're the one who tracks animals for a living, so do your job.
translation.ko: 동물 추적하는 게 네 일이니 알아서 찾아

translation.en: Meanwhile, I've already spread the word
translation.ko: 난 벌써 그 두 놈을 잡아오면

translation.en: that I am offering a reward to anyone that finds them.
translation.ko: 보상을 한다고 이미 소문을 쫙 퍼뜨렸지

translation.en: I promise you, Richard,
one day you will get what's coming to you.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 너도 후회할 날이 올 거야

translation.en: -Well, what did tu hermano say? -[Kong hoots]
He said Lady and Lucky are missing.
I know, bro, but we'll find them.
Amy, the ligers are both GPS-chipped, right?
translation.ko: 에이미, 두 마리 다 GPS 추적장치 달았지?

translation.en: Yes. I have the receiver in my backpack.
I smell a robotic rat. I checked on the cats after Kong had already left the island,
translation.ko: 쥐새끼 같으니, 콩이 섬을 떠난 뒤 내가 확인했어

translation.en: they were safely locked in their temporary habitat.
translation.ko: 둘 다 자기 우리에 안전하게 갇혀 있었어

translation.en: Yeah, I figured Richard was lying.
You think he's using the ligers to try and bait us into a trap?
translation.ko: 라이거를 이용해 덫에 걸려들게 하려는 걸까?

translation.en: Yeah, but we still gotta save Lucky and his mom, right?
Don't worry, that's exactly what Jonesy and I plan to do.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마, 나와 존시도 그럴 생각이니까

translation.en: No way, Kong, it's too dangerous. You need--
Save it, Lukas. Kong's made up his mind. He's coming, too.
translation.ko: - 넌... - 그만, 루커스 콩은 이미 결심했어요 같이 간대요

translation.en: [sighs] Kong is as valiente as he is stubborn.
translation.ko: 콩은 이미 결심했어요 같이 간대요 콩은 용감하지만 고집도 세

translation.en: -[Chatter] Stubborn supremo! Awk! -I have their signal!
Lucky and Lady are on the south side of San Francisco.
[gasps] Lady's heart rate is off the charts!
She doesn't appear to be moving,
so she must be terrified of something or someone.
translation.ko: 아마 뭔가에 많이 놀란 것 같아

translation.en: Okay, so how do you propose we sneak a gigantic gorilla
translation.ko: 그나저나 거대한 고릴라가 어떻게 눈에 안 띄고

translation.en: across a crowded city?
[laughing] This is the coolest ride ever!
Personally, I'm looking forward to getting my feet back on terra firma.
translation.ko: 솔직히 난 단단한 땅을 얼른 밟았으면 좋겠어

translation.en: -[Kong grunts softly] -[Lukas shushing] Quiet, Kong.
He seems unusually nervous for some reason.
Duh, 'cause he never learned how to swim. That's not true.
We used to swim in the lake near our place in the Redwoods all summer.
translation.ko: 레드우즈 집 근처 호수에서 여름마다 수영했다고

translation.en: Kong says you were swimming,
translation.ko: 콩 말이 루커스는 수영하고 자기는 바닥을 걸었대요

translation.en: he was walking on the bottom, the water barely came up to his waist.
translation.ko: 콩 말이 루커스는 수영하고 자기는 바닥을 걸었대요 물이 허리까지밖에 안 찼대요

translation.en: -[alarm blaring] -[Lukas] Hold it!
-[horn continues blaring] -[Danny] Duck!
Everyone hide under the water!
[man] Hard to starboard!
Hmm, I don't remember any island here...
[Amy] I'm certain the GPS is correct.
But it doesn't make any sense.
How could the ligers even get in there?
All I know is, their vitals are dangerously high.
-We must find them before... -[faint alarm ringing]
Will you pathetic weaklings hurry?
Listen, lady, or whatever you are,
we're not moving men, we're professional poachers.
Professional poachers, an excellent example of an oxymoron.
-What'd she just call us? -Forget about it.
translation.ko: - 지금 뭐라고 한 거야? - 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: Your boss didn't tell us we'd be robbing a military warehouse.
translation.ko: 당신 보스가 군대 창고를 턴다는 말은 안 했어

translation.en: -I don't like it. -Yeah.
We get caught, and it's the rest of our lives behind bars.
translation.ko: - 마음에 안 들어 - 잡히면 평생 감옥에서 썩게 될 거라고

translation.en: You two are not the ones that will be apprehended tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 체포되는 건 당신 둘이 아니야

translation.en: Here is your payment.
The two ligers, as promised.
-[gasps] There they are! -Easy, Danny!
-We don't want them to see-- -[Kong grunts]
-[Brag] Holy... -It's that monster ape from the news!
[Brag] Hey, you can't just leave us here alone with that monster.
translation.ko: 저 괴물 있는 곳에 버리고 가면 어떡해?

translation.en: You won't be for long.
We have a little surprise for Kong and his allies.
translation.ko: 콩과 친구들을 위해 깜짝 선물을 준비했거든

translation.en: -What? -Why?
[Botila] Everything has gone exactly as planned.
For once.
Indeed. The stolen weapons will net a fortune on the black market.
translation.ko: 그렇군 훔친 무기는 암시장에서 거액을 받을 거야

translation.en: What about the laser cannon?
Already installed and ready to go.
Internal note, reevaluate giant ape's capabilities.
translation.ko: 기억해 둘 것 거대 원숭이의 능력을 재평가할 것

translation.en: [Wheeler] Forget the cats, let's get out of here!
[Brag] What is it with us and apes?
[panting] Hey, Wheeler, you don't think that giant could be the baby we--
translation.ko: 휠러, 저 거대 원숭이가 우리가 잡았던 그...

translation.en: Yeah, I bet, 'cause look there!
He looks just like the guy who stole from us!
He was just a kid, but I'm sure that's the one!
I swore one day I'd get even with you, and that goes double now!
translation.ko: 내 언젠가 복수한다고 맹세했지 이젠 두 배로 갚아주마

translation.en: Look out!
[Jonesy] It set off the detonation timer!
Let's do this before the whole place blows!
T-Rex is gonna crush Kong!
No, it's leaving!
-[Kong groaning] -[Danny] I don't get it.
-[planes humming] -[Danny] Now, I do.
It's the Army!
We need to kill those lights!
Pitch your fastball, Kong! Aim for the lights!
Okay, just one more!
[Jonesy] No time! The bomb's gonna blow!
translation.ko: - 좋아, 하나만 더 - 시간이 없어 곧 폭발할 거야!

translation.en: Kong! Lady!
[Lukas] This way, guys! Come on! Run!
[gasps] Where are they?
[sighs] They're okay! Kong has Lady!
Good job, Kong! Now get us out of here, bro.
Footage taken from Army aircraft this evening clearly proves
translation.ko: 오늘 저녁 군용기에서 찍은 영상을 보면 콩이라 불리는 거대 원숭이가

translation.en: that the giant ape known as Kong is responsible
for stealing an entire stockpile of military grade weapons,
translation.ko: 군용 무기를 훔친 것으로 확인이 됐는데

translation.en: with the help of his radical master, Lukas Remy.
translation.ko: 주인인 루커스 레미도 도운 것으로 보입니다

translation.en: Oh, thank goodness you are all right!
We were just watching you on the news.
[Chatter] Bad news! Bawk!
Looks like your brother did a great job of framing Kong for the heist tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘은 리처드가 콩을 모함하는 데 성공했군

translation.en: And his own hermano. Not just Kong and Lukas, you, too.
translation.ko: 그리고 자기 형제까지! 콩과 루커스뿐만 아니라 자네까지

translation.en: [Danny] Hey, count me in! Looks we're all fugitives now.
translation.ko: - 저도 넣어줘요 - 우리 다 도망자 신세군

translation.en: Except Anita and my sis.
I'm certain they'll be trying to find us, too, since we all work together.
translation.ko: 우리도 같이 찾으려 하겠지 같이 일을 하니까

translation.en: [reporter on monitor] The public outcry is loud and clear...
capture these criminals.
Hunt down and destroy Kong!
[Richard] My buyer is paying a fortune for these.
Enough that I can add built-in weapons systems
in all my new and improved bionobots.
Maybe I'll even upgrade you.
I am already state-of-the-art.
-I am not. -[metal whirring]
My father didn't believe in using science to make one man superior to another.
translation.ko: 아버지는 과학으로 초인을 만드는 데 반대하셨어

translation.en: I do.
Once I'm finished upgrading myself,
I will be the most powerful bionoman on Earth.
translation.ko: 지구 상에서 가장 강한 생체공학 인간이 될 거야

translation.en: [Lukas] Now that we've seen the kinds of weapons Kong may be up against,
translation.ko: 콩이 맞서 싸워야 할 무기가 뭔지 알았으니

translation.en: I think we'd better start working on some armored bands, so he can deflect them.
translation.ko: 무기가 튕겨 나가는 방패 같은 걸 만들자

translation.en: Yeah! Or even better, bat 'em back to sender!
[laughs] Don't worry, I'll teach you.
Looks like we're gonna be on the defense for a while.
[Chatter] Bawk! Go, team!
At least until we can figure out a way to clear our names
and prove Kong is innocent.
Hey, yo, Lucky!
How you doing, little guy?
Hey, where's his mom? Where's Lady?
After everything Lady had been through...
[stammers] her heart just couldn't...
translation.ko: 레이디는 충격이 컸나 봐 심장이 못 견디고...

translation.en: [Danny] Oh, no. She's gone?
If only the rest of the world could see how gentle he is.
translation.ko: 콩이 얼마나 착한지 사람들이 알면 좋으련만

translation.en: Unfortunately, my brother has turned this into a war.
And it's just begun.
